definitions: in a way that has or is intended to have a useful or beneficial purpose

examples.text: the party has engaged constructively in this debate

shortDefinitions: in way that has or is intended to have useful or beneficial purpose

definitions: in a way that is not obvious or explicitly stated but may be inferred

examples.text: this non-disclosure was said to be constructively tantamount to fraud

shortDefinitions: in way that is not obvious or explicitly stated
